articles.title: South Africa hits back at US plan to favour white Afrikaner 'refugees' - BBC
articles.description: Pretoria rubbishes claims of a white genocide and quotes prominent Afrikaners who dub Trump's plans racist.
articles.content: The South African government has criticised the US's decision to prioritise refugee applications from white Afrikaners, saying claims of a white genocide have been widely discredited and lack reliabl… [+2065 chars]
